DamageImmunities: Poison, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Whispers of Deception
Traits.Content: The Maw can mimic familiar voices to disorient and lure creatures beneath it. Creatures that can hear it and are within 30 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become distracted and have disadvantage on their next perception check to detect it.

Traits.Name: Lingering Darkness
Traits.Content: The Maw is surrounded by a magical darkness that extends 10 feet from it in all directions. While within this darkness, it is considered invisible.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Maw in the Ceiling makes three attacks, either with Bite or Devouring Gaze. It can replace one of those attacks with Luring Whisper.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Devouring Gaze
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) psychic damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Luring Whisper
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) psychic damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn, drawn in by the whispers it hears.
